Name: Darth Jäger
Instructions: Place old-fashioned glass over shot glass and UPEND to leave full shot glass now upside down in old-fashioned glass.
Slowly POUR cider into old fashioned glass.
Review: This riff on a Jägerbomb leaves the 'Dark Lord' sitting in 'Ciderspace'.
History: Created in 2012 by Darren Warburton at Buddha on the Beach bar on Koh Tao Island, Thailand.
Nutrition: One serving of Darth Jäger contains 128 calories
